title: The Legend of Drew Brees, Browns still a mess, How bowl season impacts the NFL Draft (Football 12/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to discuss Drew Brees' surprising career path (9:15) and the weekly dysfunction that exists within the Browns organization (22:50). The guys also take a look at the 2020 NFL Draft (42:45), analyzing the stock of players that plan to skip bowl games and what bowl games to keep an eye on over the next week from a draft perspective.
